mdRecord.dcterms:title: Arthur J. Balfour Addresses Members of the French and British Missions at Washington's Tomb, April 29, 1917
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harris & Ewing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of members of the French and British Missions gathered at Washington tomb being addressed by Arthur J. Balfour, head of the British Mission. The photographer's name [Harris & Ewing] is embossed in the bottom right corner. Two holes and grommets are punched at left edge.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Tomb
